remarks: Transfer a transitivity law to the function relation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 28-Jul-2014.)
statement:
caofref.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. V ) $.
caofref.2 $e |- ( ph -> F : A --> S ) $.
caofcom.3 $e |- ( ph -> G : A --> S ) $.
caofass.4 $e |- ( ph -> H : A --> S ) $.
caoftrn.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ ( x e. S /\ y e. S /\ z e. S ) ) -> ( ( x R y /\ y T z ) -> x U z ) ) $.
caoftrn $p |- ( ph -> ( ( F oR R G /\ G oR T H ) -> F oR U H ) ) $.
$d F x y z $.
$d G x y z $.
$d H x y z $.
$d R x y z $.
$d S x y z $.
$d T x y z $.
$d U x y z $.
$d ph x y z $.
$d x y z $.
$d x y z $.
